verify.summary: Sync your Server Profile with your Roblox Account.
verify.signup:
## Connect Roblox Account
You must be new to mellow, click Continue to link your Roblox Account with Voxelified.
This message will update with your server profile status after you link a Roblox Account.
verify.complete.true.2: Your roles and nickname have been updated.
verify.complete.false:
## Server Profile is up-to-date
Your server profile is already up-to-date, no adjustments have been made.

If you were expecting a different result, you may need to wait a few minutes.
verify.no_server:
## Cannot Sync Profile
This Discord Server is not connected to mellow, Roblox Syncing is not available.
verify.profile: You are currently syncing in this server as [{{0.displayName}}](https://www.roblox.com/users/{{0.id}}/profile).
verifyall.summary: Forcefully sync the profiles of everyone in this server.
